marq.Qatar Visa Center, Colombo will resume o: Qatar Visa Center, Colombo will resume operations from 20th of January 2021 and the appointment bookings are available now | Please be informed that Qatar Visa Centers (QVCs) do not provide job offers of any kind. QVC role is to provide the legal services necessary for the issuance of visa. Hence, kindly beware of fraudulent/fictitious job offers from individuals misrepresenting themselves as agents or representatives of Qatar Visa Center

contentText.Medical check-up is mandatory before tra: Medical check-up is mandatory before travelling to Qatar
contentText.Expats who wish to visit the State of Qa: Expats who wish to visit the State of Qatar are required to apply for a Residence Visa with the Government of Qatar. As a part of the process, the people who are going to work and stay in Qatar from specific countries need to undergo a medical fitness check before traveling to Qatar.
contentText.The Qatar Medical Center (QMC) is exclus: The Qatar Medical Center (QMC) is exclusively authorized by the Ministry of Interiors, Qatar to provide a Visa Medical certificate. QMC provides an efficient and up-to-date medical fitness check.
contentText.indialocation: In India, our centers are located in Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, Hyderabad, Chennai, Lucknow, and Kochi.
contentText.pakistanlocation: In Pakistan, our centers are located in Karachi and Islamabad
contentText.bangaladeshlocation: In Bangladesh, our centers are located in Dhaka and Sylhet.
contentText.Philippineslocation: In Philippines, our center is located in Manila.
contentText.Nepallocation: In Nepal, our center is located in Kathmandu.
contentText.Srilankalocation: In Srilanka, our center is located in Colombo.
contentText.Our team of professionals understands th: Our team of professionals understands the visa requirements. They are trained to support the applicants throughout the process. The Visa Medical Test is a sequential process that starts with the confirmation of the appointment. On reaching the centers, the applicants are guided on how they need to proceed further.
contentText.The Visa applicants are expected to unde: The Visa applicants are expected to undergo a preliminary medical check in their home country as part of the visa application process for the State of Qatar. The tests are carried out in the following steps
contentText.STEMZ was founded in 2015, to become the: STEMZ was founded in 2015, to become the leading healthcare provider for tourists, immigrants and working professionals serving Government and Diplomatic missions globally.
contentText.We believe in creating a long-lasting re: We believe in creating a long-lasting relationship with all our stakeholders, including our visitors, employees and partners.
contentText.STEMZ is backed by a team of highly qual: STEMZ is backed by a team of highly qualified healthcare professionals with internal systems and processes based on the latest medical standards and best practices.
contentText.Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of: Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of highly qualified healthcare professionals with internal systems and processes based on the latest medical standards and best practices.
contentText.pakistanfootercontent: Qatar medical center is backed by a team of highly qualified healthcare professionals with internal systems and processes based on the latest medical standards and best practices.
contentText.Take the next step in your career with Q: Take the next step in your career with Qatar Medical Center
contentText.Please remember to mention the job title: Please remember to mention the job title and location in the subject line.
contentText.PLEASE SEND US YOUR RESUME AT careers@qa: PLEASE SEND US YOUR RESUME AT careers@qatarmedicalcenter.com
contentText.pakistanstemzhealthcontent: In 2018, we launched the Qatar Medical Center as a dedicated healthcare facility catering to the medical needs of tourists, immigrants, and working professionals visiting the State of Qatar. Our center boasts a robust infrastructure, streamlined systems, and well-defined processes that prioritize the well-being and convenience of our applicants and visitors, while also complying with all relevant government regulations.

BookReferralAppointmentpopuptext.Only referral medical appointments can b: Only referral medical appointments can be booked
BookReferralAppointmentpopuptext.Fresh applicants are required to book an: Fresh applicants are required to book an appointment through

contentText.Stemz Healthcare was founded in 2015, to: Stemz Healthcare was founded in 2015, to become the leading healthcare service provider for tourists, immigrants, and working professionals. We are a globally established organization and believe in creating lasting relationships with our employees, partners, and visitors, that establishes a positive environment based on honesty and trust.
contentText.Our infrastructure, systems, and process: Our infrastructure, systems, and processes have been developed to provide support and comfort to applicants and visitors while ensuring all government requirements are adhered to. At Stemz Healthcare we believe in innovation and continuous growth. We provide support to our employees, ensure they are trained on the latest techniques, processes, and protocols, and maintain an up-to-date technology-enabled environment at all our centers.
contentText.Stemz Healthcare manages the Visa Medica: Stemz Healthcare manages the Visa Medical part of the process through the Qatar Medical Centers which are strategically located in the same location as the Qatar Visa Centers for the convenience of the applicants.
contentText.The Ministry of Interior, State of Qatar: The Ministry of Interior, State of Qatar has awarded a mandate to Biomet Services Pte. Ltd to provide select residency procedures on its behalf in eight countries through the Qatar Visa Centers.
contentText.As per the agreement, those coming to wo: As per the agreement, those coming to work in Qatar must complete their biometric enrollment, undergo medical examinations, and sign their work contracts in their home countries before coming to Qatar.
contentText.The first phase of the project will take: The first phase of the project will take place in eight countries: India, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Philippines & Tunisia with the first ‘Qatar Visa Center launched in Colombo, Sri Lanka.
contentText.The main objective behind this project i: The main objective behind this project is for the Ministry of Interior to align the rights of the workers with the best international standards while providing the services in the state-of-the-art facilities through a seamless efficient process.
contentText.Our expertise and effective collaboratio: Our expertise and effective collaboration make sure that we achieve our goal of becoming the leading integrated global healthcare provider for travel and general health.
contentText.As the dedicated provider for medical he: As the dedicated provider for medical health screenings, our goal is to provide an efficient customer-oriented service. We are one strong team united by our mission and values in our relentless quest to be the global partner of choice in Travel healthcare solutions. We are committed to building symbiotic relationships.
contentText.Visa Medical Services – Some governments: Visa Medical Services – Some governments require a certificate of health before applying for entry visas, these tests may differ depending upon various factors including nationality and the type of visa applied for.
contentText.Stemz Healthcare provides visa medical s: Stemz Healthcare provides visa medical services to individuals who meet medical fitness standards while applying for work or tourist visas for specific countries. Our protocols are aligned with the requirements of international government departments.
contentText.pakistancontent1: We are a globally established organization and believe in creating lasting relationships with our employees, partners, and visitors, that establishes a positive environment based on honesty and trust. As the pioneer in Visa Medical outsourcing in the Middle East, we now operate state-of-the-art medical centers around multiple countries on behalf of Client-Governments to provide efficient immigration health examinations to visa applicants.
contentText.pakistancontent2: Our first Qatar Medical Center was established in 2018 to provide healthcare services for tourists, immigrants, and working professionals travelling to the State of Qatar. Our infrastructure, systems, and processes have been developed to provide support and comfort to applicants and visitors while ensuring adherence to all government requirements.
contentText.pakistancontent3: At QMC, we believe in innovation and continuous growth. We provide support to our employees, ensure they are trained on the latest techniques, processes, and protocols, and maintain an up-to-date technology-enabled environment at all our medical centers.
contentText.pakistanwhoweare1: Qatar Medical Center manages the Visa Medical part of the Visa Application Process. The QMCs are strategically located in the same location as the Qatar Visa Centers for the convenience of the Visa Applicants.
contentText.pakistanwhoweare2: As per the agreement, those coming to work in Qatar must complete their biometric enrollment, undergo medical examinations, and sign their work contracts in their home countries before traveling to Qatar.
contentText.pakistanwhoweare3: The main objective behind this project is for the Ministry of Interior to align the rights of the workers with the best international standards while providing the services in state-of-the-art facilities through a seamless efficient process.
contentText.pakistanourvision1: Our expertise and effective collaboration make sure that we achieve our goal of becoming the leading integrated global healthcare provider for travel and general health
contentText.pakistanourmission1: As the dedicated provider for medical health screenings, our goal is to provide an efficient customer-oriented service. We are one strong team united by our mission and values in our relentless quest to be the global partner of choice in Travel healthcare solutions. We are committed to building symbiotic relationships.
contentText.pakistanourcoreservice1: Visa Medical Services – Some governments require a certificate of health before applying for entry visas, these tests may differ depending upon various factors including nationality and the type of visa applied for.
contentText.pakistanourcoreservice2: We provide visa medical services to individuals who meet medical fitness standards while applying for work or tourist visas for specific countries. Our protocols are aligned with the requirements of international government departments.

contentText.We follow strict guidelines defined by t: We follow strict guidelines defined by the Qatar Ministry of Interior to provide an efficient and up-to-date medical fitness check service aligned to the Qatar Government’s requirements.
contentText.Our team is well-versed with government: Our team is well-versed with government visa requirements and trained to support applicants throughout the medical test part of the application process. On the confirmation of the appointment, the visa medical process is carried out in sequential steps and the applicants are led through the center efficiently and seamlessly.
contentText.Access to the QMC is restricted to appli: Access to the QMC is restricted to applicants only.
contentText.Our staff are not involved in the decisi: Our staff are not involved in the decision-making process and cannot provide immigration advice. All visa applications are assessed and decided by Qatar Authorities.
contentText.The medical investigations done by all o: The medical investigations done by all our centers as part of the medical fitness check are the same and these may or may not be the same as the medical investigations done by visa centers of other countries or missions. While we make every effort to adhere to the stipulated turnaround timelines for the visa application and medical process, in some cases customers may be called back to the center on the advice of authorised medical professionals, for additional testing within the parameters of what is required by the Qatar visa process, as outlined below.
contentText.As per the Qatar Ministry of Health guid: As per the Qatar Ministry of Health guidelines, the applicants will be required to undergo advanced medical investigations if there are certain findings in their medical report after the initial medical fitness check at the center. If there are findings in an applicant’s :
contentText.a) X-ray investigation, then the applica: X-ray investigation, then the applicant may be required to revisit the QVC for advanced X-ray investigations.
contentText.b) Blood investigation, then the applica: Blood investigation, then the applicant may be required to revisit the QVC for advanced blood investigations through an approved external laboratory.
contentText.c) Doctor investigation, then the applic: Doctor investigation, then the applicant may be required to consult a specialist doctor at an approved external hospital.
contentText.completionsteps: The completion of the above steps may still result in the rejection of an applicant's visa application by the Qatar Ministry of Interior.
contentText.The appointments are confirmed through S: The appointments are confirmed through SMS and/or emails. To complete the Visa Medical Process, the applicants must provide their active contact numbers and email ids. In case of referrals/revisits, the applicants are only allowed to enter the center if they have a confirmation of the appointment on SMS.
contentText.Once the applicants go through the refer: Once the applicants go through the referred tests/consultations, they are required to submit their reports to the medical center physically/ in person.

contentText.contentText1: We would like to bring this to the notice of all the job seekers and general public that recruitments for our organization are carried out through a well-established selection procedure.
contentText.contentText2: We do not solicit any money from any candidate at any stage of the recruitment process.
contentText.contentText3: We are not responsible for the amount paid by the individuals to any individual/group of individuals/agencies purporting to be representing the organization.
contentText.Take the next step in your career with Q: Take the next step in your career with Qatar Medical Center

popuptext.Public Notice- Beware of Recruitment Fra: Public Notice- Beware of Recruitment Fraudsters
popuptext.popupcontent: It has been learnt that some frauds are cheating potential job seekers by posing as 'authorised recruitment agency'. They issue fake appointment letters using Company's name, logo, website link and address on fake stationery and communicate via fake e-mail IDs as well as phone numbers. They also ask for money in place of an offer letter and confirmation of selection.

contentText.All Visa Medical Tests are carried out a: All Visa Medical Tests are carried out at the Qatar Medical Centers within a few hours after applicants complete their visa application process and biometric enrolment at the Qatar Visa Center (QVC).
contentText.The Visa Medical Test is automatically s: The Visa Medical Test is automatically scheduled when the applicants book their appointment for biometric enrolment via the QVC website. The time interval between both appointments is approximately one hour.
contentText.Example: If the biometric appointment is: Example: If the biometric appointment is set for 09:30 AM as per the QVC website appointment scheduler, the Visa Medical Test is automatically set at 10:30 AM.
contentText.For any information on the appointment a: For any information on the appointment at Qatar Visa Center, Please click
contentText.Appointments for first time booking can: Appointments for first-time booking can be done at the Qatar Visa Center. Please click
contentText.Appointments for referral booking or any: Appointments for referral booking or any pending medical tests can be done at Qatar Medical Center.
contentText.All appointments are managed by the Qata: All appointments are managed by the Qatar Visa Center. Please refer to the details here -
contentText.The Visa Medical Report is usually valid: The Visa Medical Report is usually valid for a period of Sixty (60) days from the date of issue depending upon your visa category. Please get in touch with your sponsor for further information.
contentText.All appointments booked through the Qata: All appointments booked through the Qatar Visa Center appointment scheduling system are automatically eligible for a Visa Medical Test on the same day. An applicant is not required to schedule an appointment separately for Visa Medical Test, except in the case of a missed appointment, whereby the applicant will need to re-schedule the appointment via the Qatar Visa Center website.
contentText.If you have completed a Visa Medical Tes: If you have completed a Visa Medical Test within the last 3 months and you are required to do the same test for a different category of visa, please contact your sponsor for further instructions.
contentText.It is recommended to arrive at the cente: It is recommended to arrive at the center at least 15 minutes before the appointment
contentText.If you are late for your appointment by: If you are late for your appointment by more than 15 minutes, then your appointment may be re-scheduled to later time.
contentText.The Visa Medical Test takes approximatel: The Visa Medical Test takes approximately 2 hours to be completed.
contentText.No fasting is required –Eat and drink as: No fasting is required –Eat and drink as normal prior to your appointment.
contentText.Do not wear any metallic objects such as: Do not wear any metallic objects such as jewelry when you come for the medical test.
contentText.Do not bring any luggage or bags as thes: Do not bring any luggage or bags as these are not allowed in the centre.
contentText.Please note that you may be asked to sto: Please note that you may be asked to store bags, wallets or purses, money in the dedicated lockers before entering the medical center.
contentText.Food items are not allowed inside the ce: Food items are not allowed inside the center
contentText.Applicants with confirmed appointment ar: Applicants with confirmed appointment are allowed in the centre, However, if applicant is disabled or a minor then he/she can be accompanied by another person to assist. Please notify the location security staff if you require further assistance.
contentText.Do not carry laptops or any other electr: Do not carry laptops or any other electronic devices, apart from your mobile phone while visiting the medical center.
contentText.checklist9A: Please note that due to security reasons, mobile phones are not permitted inside the QMC premises anytime during your visit. These may be stored in the dedicated lockers before entering the medical center.
contentText.You may be required to store your person: You may be required to store your personal belongings in the dedicated lockers before entering the medical center.
contentText.Taking pictures/photographs without the: Taking pictures/photographs without the permission of authorized personnel in the centre is strictly prohibited.
contentText.You will be required to sign a consent f: You will be required to sign a consent form before starting the visa medical process.
contentText.The Qatar Medical Center shall not be re: The Qatar Medical Center shall not be responsible for any loss of personal items or belongings.
contentText.For your comfort during vaccination and: For your comfort during vaccination and blood sampling, please wear loose-fitting clothing that allows easy access to your upper arm.
contentText.Please bring the following:: Please bring the following when you come for the visa medical examination on the day of appointment:
contentText.Current valid passport: Original copy of current valid Passport
contentText.All documents released by Qatar Visa Cen: All documents released by Qatar Visa Center
contentText.Any medial report(s) relating to your he: Any medical report(s) relating to your health condition
contentText.Prescription glasses or contact lenses (: Prescription glasses or contact lenses (if applicable) with the latest eyesight number
contentText.It is recommended to arrive 15 minutes b: It is recommended to arrive 15 minutes before the appointment. The Visa Medical Test may take upto 02 hours to be completed.
contentText.If you do not bring a certain document r: If you do not bring a certain document required for the Visa medical process, you may be required to re-schedule your appointment to the next available time/date.
contentText.The video describes steps of the Visa Me: The video describes steps of the Visa Medical Process
contentText.procesA3: Recording of physical signs such as height, weight and blood pressure
contentText.procesC1: Elisa Testing for HIV, Hbsag & Anti HCV
contentText.procesC3: Biochemistry tests such as Random blood sugar, SGOT, SGPT, Serum Creatinine
contentText.All Applicants will be notified through: All Applicants will be notified through an SMS or call in the event they are required to undergo any additional test as a part of the referral process
contentText.During the Visa Medical process, if ther: During the Visa Medical process, if there is any finding that requires further investigation, the applicant will have to revisit the Qatar Medical Center to get further instructions in order to complete their Visa Medical process. Appointment can be booked either by contacting the call center or by visiting
contentText.If the applicant doesn’t visit the cente: If the applicant doesn’t visit the center within four (04) weeks from the date of his/her first visit, then applicant may have to go through the entire visa medical process again and the current medical process will be deemed expired.
contentText.All medical Referrals will require appli: All medical Referrals will require applicant to collect a referral letter from the center, visit the specialist referred to complete the required medical tests and return to the center with the referral report/ invoices.
contentText.The Qatar Medical Center will submit you: The Qatar Medical Center will submit your medical test results directly to the respective authority. Please get in touch with your sponsor if you require any further information regarding your medical test. For any further assistance please get in touch with the QVC contact center.
contentText.We are supportive of reasonable preferen: We are supportive of reasonable preferences. In case of female doctor assistance, we will do our best to accommodate you.
contentText.All applicants are required to remove je: All applicants are required to remove jewelry and/or any metallic accessories. Long hair must be tied back and away from the face and front body area.
contentText.If you normally wear a head covering (hi: If you normally wear a head covering (hijab), you can still wear this at the time of visible for a photograph from the bottom of your chin to above your eyebrows, including both cheeks for identity check medical examination. However, at some point of time, your face must be clearly.
contentText.In case of a pregnancy, it is imperative: In case of a pregnancy, it is imperative that you MUST notify us during the registration process.
contentText.Chest X-Ray will not be processed incase: Chest X-Ray will not be processed incase of a suspected pregnant applicant.
contentText.No. However, your photograph will be tak: No. However, your photograph will be taken on the same day to confirm your identity. Your face must be uncovered for the photograph.
contentText.No. It is necessary to arrive for your a: No. It is necessary to arrive for your appointment not earlier than 15 minutes prior to the scheduled time.
contentText.All appointments are pre-scheduled, and: All appointments are pre-scheduled, and you will be checked-in for your scheduled appointment block even if you arrive early.
contentText.You will receive an update via SMS on th: You will receive an update via SMS on the registered number. The Qatar Medical Center is unable to provide an update about the processing of your visa application. If you need further advice, please contact Qatar Visa Center or your sponsor.
contentText.If a medical referral is required, then: If a medical referral is required, then applicant will be required to re-visit the center. It is important to provide the correct contact information. If the retesting/referral process takes longer than two months, then the entire Visa Medical Test may be repeated.
contentText.If you are at the medical centre, you ca: If you are at the medical Center, you can request a feedback form. We at Qatar Medical Center welcome your feedback/suggestions (if any) to serve you better. Please write to us on
contentText.general6: The Qatar Medical Center offers check-ups covering X-ray, blood check, eye test, vaccinations, doctor examination and consultations to the Visa Applicants
contentText.general7: Qatar Medical Center operates at 14 centers in 6 countries worldwide - India, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Nepal, and the Philippines.
contentText.general8-a: Appointment Letter: Make sure that your name on the appointment letter is the same as in your passport.
contentText.general8-b: Passport: Should be valid for at least six months.
contentText.general9: The Lounge service is an optional service and does not affect or guarantee a faster visa or medical processing by the Ministry of Interior, the State of Qatar.
contentText.medicalreferral1: As a part of the Visa Application Process, some applicants (Lounge/VIP included) may be issued a medical referral to undergo advanced medical investigations as per the protocols defined by the Qatar authorities. These advanced medical investigations are described to as Medical Referrals.
contentText.medicalreferral2: The applicants will be notified of this revisit by an SMS/ Call. It is suggested to provide correct active contact information at the reception when asked.
contentText.medicalreferral3: The applicants may need to book a referral appointment to undergo the referral process which is explained by SMS/ Call.
contentText.medicalreferral4: These tests may take from days to weeks to be completed depending on the nature of the advanced tests.
contentText.medicalreferral5a: 1) Additional X-ray images - Applicants may be required to revisit the Qatar Medical Center for additional X-ray images based on MoH instructions.
contentText.medicalreferral5b: 2) Additional lab tests - If additional lab tests are required, then blood samples are sent to external labs for further testing.
contentText.medicalreferral5c: 3) External Specialist tests - Applicants may be referred to specialists at approved hospitals for further tests based on MoH guidelines (may require the collection of referral letter/ document submission).
contentText.medicalreferral6: Applicants who are issued a medical referral are required to complete only the test(s) that are recommended by MoH Qatar as mentioned in their referral letter issued by Qatar Medical Center.  Any request for additional test(s) that are not mentioned in the referral letter issued by Qatar Medical Center during the visit to the referred hospitals can be reported to Qatar Medical Center by calling at the helpline number or by writing at
contentText.medicalreferral7: After the review of the initial Medical reports, MoH may prescribe Additional X-ray images/ Lab tests/ Specialist tests for deeper diagnosis or for confirmatory analysis.
contentText.medicalreferral8a: The applicants may be required to –
contentText.medicalreferral8b: 1) Visit External Healthcare Facilities for certain advanced medical investigations issued by Qatar MoH, including CT scans, QuantiFERON tests and other tests
contentText.medicalreferral8c: 2) Re-visit Qatar Medical Center facilities for additional X-ray scans as per instructions from Qatar MoH, either on the same day of their visit or later based on their availability
contentText.medicalreferral8d: *In certain special cases, the applicants may be allowed to complete their advanced medical tests at a different Qatar Medical Center location within the country
contentText.medicalreferral9: To ensure that all advanced medical tests are carried out as per the guidelines and meet quality standards, Qatar Medical Center identifies and empanels accredited healthcare facilities (hospitals/ labs) that meet regulatory standards like NABL (National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories) and NABH (National Accreditation Board for Hospitals & Healthcare Providers).  Applicants are hence required to complete their referral process only at the approved external labs/hospitals to complete their process.
contentText.medicalreferral10: Additional X-ray scans are conducted at the Qatar Medical Center at no cost to the applicant. However, for advanced medical investigations that are conducted at external approved medical facilities, the applicants may be required to pay the test charges directly at the referred medical facilities. An official receipt will be issued to the applicant directly by the external medical facilities
contentText.medicalreferral11: In case applicants requiring advanced medical investigations do not wish to undergo such investigations, they can choose to not proceed with their visa application by filling out the refusal form available at the reception desk.
contentText.Complaints1: Qatar Medical Center follows a Zero Tolerance Policy Towards Bribery & Corruption. Please report any corruption or solicitation for bribe by contacting us on our helpline number or email us at
contentText.MedicalReferralNew1: To comply with the regulations, set by the Qatar authorities, it is mandatory to have the test performed exclusively at the approved external medical center. Reports from any other hospital or medical center will not be accepted. It is essential to follow this requirement to ensure the validity and acceptance of the test results
contentText.MedicalReferralNew2: To obtain a copy of your medical reports conducted at the external medical centers, you can either submit a written request at the Qatar medical center or send an email to info@qatarmedicalcenter.com. Our team will make every effort to respond to your request within 24 hours and assist you accordingly. Please note that the processing time may vary, but we strive to provide you with the necessary information as soon as possible.
contentText.MedicalReferralNew3: To finalize the process and comply with the guidelines set by the authorities in Qatar, it is important to note that specific fees are associated with the visa medical process. These prices have been specifically negotiated with the hospitals to ensure convenience for the applicants. By completing the required tests and procedures at the approved medical facilities, you will fulfil the necessary requirements for your visa application.
contentText.MedicalReferralNew4: If you decide to discontinue the medical screening process, you can fill out the 'Refusal Form' available at the reception desk of the Qatar Medical Centre. Please refer to the pre-print document for more information and specific details on how to proceed with the discontinuation.
contentText.MedicalReferralNew5: Please ensure to complete the tests mentioned in the referral letter at the externally approved medical centers. If the doctor recommends any additional tests, please contact the Call Centre for confirmation. To know more about the referral process, please refer to the pre-printed document provided to you.
contentText.MedicalReferralNew6: To ensure accurate assessment of blood pressure medication, it is advised to wait for a week before revisiting the center. This allows sufficient time for the medication to take effect and accurately evaluate its impact on your blood pressure levels.
contentText.MedicalReferralNew7a: According to the guidance provided by the Ministry of Health (MOH), it is required to undergo a blood test. If any additional blood tests are required, they must be performed at authorized and approved external facilities. For these additional medical investigations conducted at external approved medical facilities, applicants may need to pay the test charges directly to the referred medical facilities.
contentText.MedicalReferralNew8: Applicants needs to provide the correct preferred location name at the GRO Counter during the Registration at QMC.

contentText.medicalpendingcontent1: You may be  required to revisit the center to complete your Visa Medical Process.
contentText.medicalpendingcontent2: Status Change may take 6-7 working days if no further tests/investigations are required.
contentText.medicalpendingcontent3: For any assistance beyond 7 days, Please contact call center
contentText.medicalpendingcontent4: to book an appointment or write to us at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com with your Visa Number and Passport Number for any assistance.
contentText.medicalreportpending1: Your additional investigations are under process as per the protocols defined by Qatar Authorities.
contentText.medicalreportpending3: For any assistance beyond 7 days, write to us at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com with your Visa Number and Passport Number.

contentText.Authoritiespending: The medical test reports have been shared with Qatar Authorities for reporting.

contentText.revisitstatus: You are required to revisit the QMC Center / External Referral Hospital for additional investigations as per the protocols defined by Qatar Authorities.

contentText.finalreport: Your visa medical report has been processed. Please contact your sponsor for the final result.

contentText.privacyPolicycontent1: This privacy policy (‘Policy’) is designed to protect the privacy of our user(s). This policy applies to the personal information collected through Stemz Healthcare website (‘Site’) only. According to this policy, personal information is referred to full or partial user details such as full name, email address, phone number, mailing address, photograph, fax numbers, passport number, visa number, passport information, employment details, nationality, etc.
contentText.privacyPolicycontent2: It’s advisable to read this policy carefully before using the site or providing your personal information on the site. Stemz Healthcare reserves the right to collect your personal information at the time of making an appointment, filling contact us form on the site.  We are not responsible to ascertain authenticity or accuracy of the personal information, provided by you. It’s your duty to ensure that your personal information must be accurate, complete and up to date.
contentText.What do we use your information for?: What do we use your information for?
contentText.useinformationcontent: We use your personal information in processing the visa application, which is the sole purpose of collecting the information. We do not use your personal information for sending any promotional emails or messages. Though, we welcome all feedback/suggestions pertaining to our site and services that we offer, and use this information to enhance the overall user experience and/or offer the better version of our services in effective and efficient manner.
contentText.How do we protect your information?: How do we protect your information?
contentText.protectinformationcontent1: We ensure to take all reasonable measures to protect your personal information and provide a safeguard to it against misuse and unauthorised access of the personal information and/or site by any third party, or unauthorised personnel.
contentText.protectinformationcontent2: We use secure server. Our network is protected through firewall security system to prevent any unauthorized access to and/or use of the site, provide secure internet browsing and safeguard to all incoming and outgoing emails. We have certain technical and physical security restrictions that limit access to, and use of, any personal information that we receive through the site.
contentText.cookiesinformation: Yes, we do. These cookies help us to remember and process your personal information accurately, understand and save your preferences for future reference, and gather aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction. Stemz Healthcare may indenture to third-party service provider for better understanding of site traffic and interactions. Though, third party service provider is not permitted to use or access your personal information.
contentText.Do we disclose any information to outsid: Do we disclose any information to outside parties?
contentText.outsidepartiesinformation: We are against to sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third party.  Authorized personnel of Stemz Healthcare, who are operating the site, conducting business process, and/or servicing you have right to access your personal information and keep it confidential as per the provision. Further, we disclose your personal information to government bodies of Qatar as a part of processing the visa application and other related procedures.  We only release your personal information if it’s appropriate to comply with the law and this policy.
contentText.thirdpartycontent: The site may contain third party links and redirect you to another websites (‘Linked Site’).  Stemz Healthcare is not responsible and/or has no control on these links and/or the content available on the linked site. we take no responsibility of protecting of your personal information on linked site, provided by you. Only user is sole responsible of all personal information in such cases.
contentText.Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act: Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act Compliance
contentText.childrenactcontent: We are in compliance with the requirements of COPPA (Childrens Online Privacy Protection Act), we do not collect any information from anyone under 13 years of age. Our website, products and services are all directed to people who are at least 13 years old or older.
contentText.onlineprivacypolicy: This online privacy policy applies only to information collected through our website and not to information collected offline.
contentText.Refer to our Terms and Conditions sectio: Refer to our Terms and Conditions section of the site.
contentText.consentcontent: You consent to this policy by accessing to, or using this site, or providing personal information through contact us page, making an appointment. You may withdraw your consent at any time by stop accessing to and/or using the site.
contentText.pocicychangecontent: Stemz Healthcare makes periodical changes in this policy and update on the site, without any prior notification. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.

footerAbt.Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of: Stemz Healthcare is backed by a team of highly qualified healthcare professionals with internal systems and processes based on the latest medical standards and best practices.

successPage.thankscontent: Thank you for expressing your interest in working with us!
successPage.submitcontent1: Due to high volume of applications, we receive, we regret that we may not able to respond to all applications individually. We will contact you within 14 days if your skills and experience match what's needed for the open position, or if there is a similiar opportunity currently available.
successPage.For any further details, please contact: For any further details, please contact us at
successPage.value: What's the Value of Working Here?
successPage.Our supporting VALUES are guided by the: Our supporting VALUES are guided by the principles of

checklistPage.What to expect while at the Qatar Medica: What to expect while at the Qatar Medical Center
checklistPage.expect1: You will be required to sign consent forms before starting the Visa Medical Process.
checklistPage.expect2: In the interest of safety and security, we reserve the right to conduct random bag searches of applicants and visitors
checklistPage.expect3: Please be ready to provide at least two (working/active) contact numbers to ensure efficient communication throughout the process.
checklistPage.expect4: Please eat normal food on the day of the visit. The examination may take a few hours to be completed.
checklistPage.expect5: If you have taken TD/MMR vaccinations earlier, submit a copy of the certificates for our records.
checklistPage.expect6: Follow all COVID guidelines and regulations. Some of the guidelines are to maintain a safe distance, wearing masks and gloves, and regular use of sanitizers for a detailed list of regulations please
checklistPage.expect7: Cooperate with our Staff waiting patiently in the waiting area.
checklistPage.Femaleapplicants1: We are supportive of reasonable preferences. In case of female doctor assistance, we will do our best to accommodate you.
checklistPage.Femaleapplicants2: All applicants are required to remove the jewellery and/or any metallic accessories. Long hair must be tied back and away from the face and front body area.
checklistPage.Femaleapplicants3: Female applicants are suggested to wear loose-fitting clothes.
checklistPage.Femaleapplicants4: In case of pregnancy, it is imperative that you MUST notify us during the registration process.
checklistPage.referral1: Appointments for a referral visit to our centers can be conveniently booked by using the “Book Referral Appointment” option or through the Contact Center.
checklistPage.referral2: Please note that all applicants are served strictly based on their confirmed appointments.It is necessary to arrive for the appointment not earlier than 15 minutes prior to the scheduled time. Applicants are checked in as per the scheduled appointment block even if they arrive early.
checklistPage.referral3: The applicants will receive an SMS notification confirming the appointment schedule, please retain this as it will be verified at the entrance. Only the verified applicants will be allowed to enter the center.
checklistPage.referral4: Applicants may be required to visit specialized (external) and approved hospitals only in case of referrals. The referral letter will include details of all such approved hospitals.
checklistPage.referral5: In case of X-Ray referrals, applicants will be contacted for additional X-Ray Images usually within 2-3 hours. The applicants are encouraged to be available for such repeat visits on the same day.
checklistPage.referral6: Applicants requiring referrals for vision will be required to carry the prescribed glasses or contact lenses during their visit to the approved hospital.
checklistPage.restrictions: Restrictions at the Qatar Medical Center
checklistPage.restrictions1: Mobile Phone Use is Strictly Prohibited.
checklistPage.restrictions2: Do not wear any metallic objects such as jewellery.
checklistPage.restrictions3: Do not bring any luggage or bags as these are not allowed in the center.
checklistPage.restrictions4: Do not carry laptops or any other electronic devices, apart from your mobile phone.
checklistPage.restrictions5: The Qatar Medical Center shall not be responsible for any loss of personal items or belongings.
checklistPage.restrictions6: We do not accept any payment at the center. Please do not pay any money. Applicants must not offer a bribe to any of the staff members.
checklistPage.restrictions7: Friends/family members of the applicants are not allowed inside the center. To avoid crowding around our centers, they will be requested to leave the premises. As an exception, guardians are allowed for children less than 18 years of age, elderly, physically/ mentally challenged applicants who need assistance. They should inform the security staff on arrival at the Medical Centre.
checklistPage.restrictions8: Please keep the area surrounding the center clean. Do not litter in and around the center.
checklistPage.restrictions9: Do not leave the center without completing the medical process
checklistPage.To curb the spread of COVID-19, we expec: To curb the spread of COVID-19, we expect all our applicants to
checklistPage.COVIDcontent1: Wear a face mask covering your nose and mouth to help protect yourself and others.
checklistPage.COVIDcontent2: Sit at a distance of at least 1 meter from other applicants.
checklistPage.COVIDcontent3: Wash hands regularly with soap and water.
checklistPage.COVIDcontent4: Carry hand sanitizer and sanitize their hands frequently.
checklistPage.COVIDcontent5: Keep mouth and nose covered while they cough, sneeze, or speak.
checklistPage.COVIDcontent6: Keep their masks clean and dispose of them properly to make the use more effective.

contentTitle.xraytitle3: What to expect inside the X-RAY room
contentTitle.xraytitle5: Additional X-RAY – If applicant couldn’t do same day referral
contentTitle.confirmatorytitle2: What to expect in case of positive screening tests for HIV, HCV, HBV & Syphilis
contentTitle.Specialistlabtitle1: Why specialist laboratory test is required
contentTitle.consultationtitle1: Why specialist referral is required during consultation

contentText.requiredcontent1: Based on the reports/ analysis/ guidelines from the Government Authorities, additional X-ray(s) may be required
contentText.requiredcontent2: The applicant will be required to revisit QMC and complete the process.
contentText.requiredcontent3: The number of X-rays may vary based on the requirements from the Government Authorities.
contentText.expectcontent1: The applicant should call the QMC call center and fix an appointment before visiting QMC. The contact number(s) of QMC call center is provided in the pre-printed form, SMS and on the website
contentText.expectcontent2: The applicant should reach QMC at least 15 minutes prior to the scheduled appointment.
contentText.expectcontent3: The applicant will be allowed inside QMC only at their appointment time only.
contentText.expectcontent4: At the QMC security check, the applicant is required to show his/ her original passport and service receipt and QVC appointment letter.
contentText.expectcontent5: Fasting is not required but it is recommended to avoid heavy meals.
contentText.expectcontent6: The applicant should not wear ornaments, tight fitting clothes and clothes with metallic objects when they visit QMC
contentText.expectcontent7: Applicants are requested not to bring luggage and bags inside the QMC.
contentText.expectcontent8: Using cell phones and taking photographs inside QMC is strictly prohibited.
contentText.xraycontent1: After issuing the service receipt token number at QMC reception, the applicant will be directed to the X-ray room for further process
contentText.xraycontent2: For a female applicant, the changing room is available inside X-ray room at QMC. They can change to a loose fitted gown.
contentText.xraycontent3: The applicant should take all the belongings before leaving the X ray room. QMC will not be responsible for any loss or damage
contentText.xraycontent4: The applicant must follow the instructions given by QMC X-ray technician [e.g. respiration (breath holding), maintaining body postures etc].
contentText.xraycontent5: The applicant cannot exit the X-ray room without the permission of the QMC X-ray technician. Sometimes, further X-ray(s) may be required post evaluation, so the applicant might be called again.
contentText.xraycontent6: If female applicants are not comfortable being examined by a male technician, they can request for a female technician at the reception
contentText.samedayreferralcontent1: After completing the initial visa medical process, the applicants are requested to wait for 30-40 minutes in the designated area at QMC or outside the QMC
contentText.samedayreferralcontent2: In case an additional X-ray examination is required, then the applicant will receive a call from QMC reception staff or QMC call center.
contentText.samedayreferralcontent3: The applicant should share active contact number(s) with the QMC for further contact.
contentText.samedayreferralcontent4: The applicants are requested to adhere to the time slot given by the QMC call center to visit QMC.
contentText.samedayreferralcontent5: A service receipt token number will be generated at the QMC reception by the QMC reception staff for the applicant.
contentText.samedayreferralcontent6: The applicant is required to go to the designated X-ray room to complete the same day X-ray Referral.
contentText.additionalxraycontent1: If an applicant is not able to complete additional X-ray(s) required on the same day, then the applicant will receive a call from the QMC call center on the contact number(s) provided by the applicant during the initial registration to book an appointment.
contentText.additionalxraycontent2: The applicant must ensure that correct contact number(s) are provided at the time of registration at QMC.
contentText.additionalxraycontent3: The QMC call center will book an appointment for the applicant to visit QMC to complete his/her additional X-ray(s).
contentText.additionalxraycontent4: The applicant should reach QMC at least 15 minutes prior the scheduled appointment time.
contentText.additionalxraycontent5: Only the applicant with a confirmed appointment is allowed inside the QMC in the given appointment slot.
contentText.additionalxraycontent6: At the QMC security check, the applicant is required to show his/ her original passport, QVC appointment letter and service receipt.
contentText.additionalxraycontent7: At the QMC reception, the QMC reception staff will issue a new service receipt token number and guide the applicant to visit the designated X-ray room.
contentText.additionalxraycontent8: Applicants can check their visa medical status at the QMC website - www.qatarmedicalcenter.com.
contentText.additionalxraycontent9: It can take up to 72 hours for change in visa status to be reflected on the website.
contentText.additionalxraycontent10: In case of any query, applicants can call the call center at the numbers provided on the website or send an email at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com.
contentText.confirmatorycontent1: The Government Authorities have stringent guidelines for infectious diseases.
contentText.confirmatorycontent2: If screening tests for these infectious diseases are positive/ reactive at the QMC laboratory,then to confirm the findings, the applicant must undergo Confirmatory Tests at authorized and approved external laboratory/ laboratories based on guidelines by the Government Authorities.
contentText.confirmatorycontent3: These confirmatory tests need to be performed at authorized and approved external laboratory/ laboratories at pre-defined intervals.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent1: The applicant will receive a call from the QMC call center on the contact number(s) provided by him/ her during initial registration to book an appointment at the QMC reception.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent2: The applicant needs to ensure that correct contact number(s) are provided at the time of registration at QMC.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent3: Once the appointment is confirmed, the QMC call center sends a confirmation message to the applicant on the contact number(s). [This is applicable for the applicants applying for Visa in India only.]
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent4: The applicant should reach QMC at least 15 minutes prior to the scheduled appointment.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent5: Fasting is not required for confirmatory tests.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent6: The applicant is required to make payments through the bank for the Confirmatory Tests at authorized and approved external laboratory/ laboratories.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent7: Using cell phones and taking photographs inside QMC is strictly prohibited
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent8: At the QMC security check, the applicant is required to show his/ her original passport, QVC appointment letter and service receipt.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent9: At the QMC reception, the documents will be verified, referral letter will be issued, and the consent is taken from the applicant for further examinations (Confirmatory Tests).
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent10: QMC reception staff will guide the applicant on the payments for the confirmatory tests at the authorized and approved external laboratory/ laboratories.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent11: On reaching QMC, the applicant will be directed to the Doctor for explanations of the test results and further course of action.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent12: In case the applicant is not comfortable in continuing with the confirmatory tests process, he/she can sign a refusal form which is available at the QMC reception desk.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent13: Once the payment process is completed, the applicant is required to submit the original payment slip at QMC reception. The applicant can keep a photocopy of the same for his/ her reference.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent14: The QMC reception staff will collect the payment slip and generate service receipt token number to visit nursing counter.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent15: The applicant will be guided to nursing station for blood sample collection.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent16: After completing sample collection process at QMC, the samples are processed for further evaluation.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent17: The reports are directly sent to QMC by the authorized and approved external laboratory.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent18: Based on the findings and guidelines of Government Authorities, the applicant may require to visit the QMC for further investigations.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent19: The applicant may be called at the contact number(s) provided by him/her to revisit the center.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent20: The above process may be repeated based on the findings and guidelines of Government Authorities.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent21: The applicant should not delay in completing the referral process.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent22: Applicants can check their visa medical status at the QMC website -www.qatarmedicalcenter.com.
contentText.positivescreeningtestcontent23: In case of any query, applicants can call the call center at the numbers provided on the website or send an email at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com.
contentText.specialistlabcontent1: The Government Authorities have defined the guidelines for Visa Medical Process
contentText.specialistlabcontent2: In case the defined guidelines are not met in the result of the lab investigations conducted at QMC lab during the initial visa medical examination for an applicant, further evaluation at an authorized and approved external hospital(s) may be required.
contentText.specialistlabcontent3: This referral is typically generated for abnormal laboratory results at the QMC laboratory
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent1: The applicant will receive a call from QMC call center on the contact number(s) provided by the applicant during the initial registration to book an appointment.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent2: The applicant needs to ensure that correct contact number(s) are provided at the time of registration at QMC.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent3: The QMC call center books an appointment for the applicant to visit QMC to complete the Specialist Laboratory Test Process.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent4: Once the appointment is confirmed, the QMC call center sends a confirmation message to the applicant on the contact number(s). If the applicant does not receive an SMS, he/ she may connect with the QMC call center again and request to resend the SMS. [This is applicable for the applicants applying for Visa in India only.]
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent5: At the QMC security check, the applicant is required to show his/ her original passport, QVC appointment letter and service receipt.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent6: At the QMC reception, the QMC reception staff will issue a Referral Letter and guide the applicant to authorized and approved external hospital(s) post identity verification.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent7: The QMC reception staff will share the contact number and address of the authorized and approved external hospital(s) with the applicant.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent8: The applicant needs to follow the process and is required to make payments for the specialist laboratory tests at the authorized and approved external hospital(s) and complete the referral process.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent9: After collecting the original reports from authorized and approved external hospital(s), the applicant must visit QMC and submit the reports.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent10: Using cell phones and taking photographs inside the QMC is strictly prohibited
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent11: The applicant is advised to keep a copy of these reports with him/her for personal records.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent12: The applicant must ensure that the specialist hospital test(s) has/have been completed as per referral letter(s) issued by QMC.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent13: Based on the medical reports from the authorized and approved external hospital(s) and guidelines from government authorities, the applicants may be required to visit QMC for further investigations.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent14: The applicants should complete the referral process at the earliest.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent15: Falsifying any of the records can result in appropriate actions against applicant.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent16: Applicants can check their visa medical status at the QMC website - www.qatarmedicalcenter.com.
contentText.specialistlabexpectcontent17: In case of any query, applicants can call the call center at the numbers provided on the website or send an email at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com.
contentText.consultationrequiredcontent1: Government Authorities have defined the guidelines for the Visa Medical Process. In case these guidelines are not met in the evaluation by a doctor during the initial visa medical examination, further evaluation of the applicant at an authorized and approved external hospital may be required.
contentText.consultationrequiredcontent2: If the applicants are required to visit one or more specialist doctors for further evaluation, they need to make payments for such consultation(s).
contentText.consultationrequiredcontent3: The type of specialist doctors to be visited can be one or more of the following:
contentText.consultationexpectcontent1: After consultation with the doctor at QMC, the applicant who needs further evaluation is required to collect his/her Referral Letter from QMC reception.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent2: The QMC reception staff will check for the applicant’s referral status and issue the Referral Letter(s) accordingly.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent3: The QMC reception staff will share the authorized and approved external hospital’s address and contact details.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent4: If required, the QMC reception staff will assist the applicant in booking an appointment at  authorized and approved external hospital.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent5: Applicants are requested to reach the authorized and approved external hospital at least 15 minutes before appointment.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent6: The applicant should follow the process and make the payments at authorized and approved external hospital.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent7: Using cell phones and taking photographs inside the QMC is strictly prohibited.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent8: The applicant needs to collect all original medical reports from the authorized and approved external hospital and check whether all medical reports and referral letter(s) have sign and stamp of the specialist doctor.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent9: After collecting the reports and referral letter(s) with sign and stamp of the specialist doctor,the applicant must visit QMC to submit these reports.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent10: The applicant is advised to keep a copy of these reports with him/her for personal records.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent11: The applicant must ensure that the consultation(s) has/have been completed as per the referral letter(s) issued by QMC.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent12: Based on the medical reports from the specialist doctors and guidelines from Government Authorities, the applicant may be required to visit QMC for further investigations.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent13: The applicant will be called at the contact number(s) provided by him/her to revisit the QMC.Please ensure correct contact number(s) are provided.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent14: For certain specialist consultation(s), the applicant may be required to come after prescribed intervals as defined by the specialist doctor. This will be explained by the doctor at QMC during the initial visa medical examination.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent15: The applicant is required to complete the consultation by specialist doctor(s) at the earliest.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent16: Falsifying any medical record may result in appropriate actions against the applicant.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent17: Applicants can check their visa medical status at the QMC website -www.qatarmedicalcenter.com.
contentText.consultationexpectcontent18: In case of any query, applicants can call the call center at the numbers provided on the website or send an email at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com.

Comman.Bookreferralcontact: For any questions or clarifications regarding your Visa Medical Process, contact us by calling or sending an email.
Comman.To Book a Medical Referral Appointment c: To Book a Medical Referral Appointment call us at
Comman.You are being directed to the Qatar Visa: You are being directed to the Qatar Visa Center website

Comman.YES, I WOULD LIKE TO CONTINUE: YES, I WOULD LIKE TO CONTINUE

Comman.antiscroller: Fraud Alert : Dear Applicant, Please be on the alert for phone/email scams and fake online platforms (including chat rooms) claiming to be QMC representatives or agents. Please do not pay money or give your personal information to fraudsters. Use only the official QMC platforms for verified and authentic information. Please report any fraud by calling us at our helpline number. You may also email us the details at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com.
Comman.bangaladeshAntiscroller: দৃষ্টি আকর্ষণ: প্রিয় আবেদনকারীরা, অনুগ্রহ করে মনে রাখবেন: রেফারেল পরীক্ষার জন্য পুনরায় নির্ধারিত অ্যাপয়েন্টমেন্ট শুধুমাত্র এই আউটবাউন্ড নম্বর থেকে প্রদান করা হবে: ০৯৬৭৭৬০২৪০২। অতিরিক্ত সহায়তার জন্য, অনুগ্রহ করে info@qatarmedicalcenter.com ইমেইলে আপনার ভিসা নম্বর এবং নাম উল্লেখ করে আমাদের সাথে যোগাযোগ করুন।. Notice/Alert: Dear Applicants, please note: All revisit appointments for referral tests will be provided only through the outbound number: 09677602402. For further assistance, please email info@qatarmedicalcenter.com and include your visa number and name.
Comman.Indiaantiscroller: QMC Relocation Notice: Please note that QMC Mumbai will operate from the 02nd Floor, Iconic Building, Urmi Estate, 95, Ganpatrao Kadam Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai 400013 with effect from Monday, 07 November 2022.We look forward to serving you at our new facility.For more information, please call the helpline or write to us at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com
Comman.antiscroller_old: Dear Applicant, Please be on the alert for phone/email scams and fake online platforms (including chat rooms) claiming to be QMC representatives or agents. Please do not pay money or give your personal information to fraudsters. Use only the official QMC platforms for verified and authentic information. Please report any fraud by calling us at our helpline number. You may also email us the details at info@qatarmedicalcenter.com
Comman.newantiscoller: Important Notice: QMC, New Delhi will be closed on Friday, September 8th and Saturday, September 9th, 2023, in observance of a public holiday declared for the G-20 Summit scheduled to be held in the NCT of Delhi. We will resume regular operations from Monday, September 11th, 2023.
Comman.disclamcontent: The sequence of the steps followed at the Qatar Medical Center may vary as per the locations.
